flow.descriptionCdata:
697e61e2-8f9e-4b0c-aa50-7ecd867e0ba0.0b4c5473-b6ca-4ba6-bcbb-6a730b2b863a.prompt=Enter the Extension (Eg. txt, xls) \: 697e61e2-8f9e-4b0c-aa50-7ecd867e0ba0.14caf891-e750-488f-a992-22ea9eaba296.prompt=Select the Operation \: 697e61e2-8f9e-4b0c-aa50-7ecd867e0ba0.154b2ce8-d908-46b0-a8e6-afd6075ca69b.prompt=Enter the Directory in which to Delete \: 697e61e2-8f9e-4b0c-aa50-7ecd867e0ba0.1b56b80e-bc28-4274-9794-ce7f4dbde555.callout=To Execute this flow select an option from the selection given by the step SelectDeleteOrZip. According to the selection the Inputs should be given according to the Operations. Note\: To Perform operations in Remote machine the system name , user id , and password is required 697e61e2-8f9e-4b0c-aa50-7ecd867e0ba0.1c3f907d-dd8d-472f-8383-44676c1bcd46.prompt=Enter the Password \: 697e61e2-8f9e-4b0c-aa50-7ecd867e0ba0.22fc6b90-0ef3-481f-b419-b7e323b00c18.prompt=Enter the Directory in which to Delete \: 697e61e2-8f9e-4b0c-aa50-7ecd867e0ba0.459aa236-ff06-412b-a3c0-7631251f497f.prompt=Give a username\: 697e61e2-8f9e-4b0c-aa50-7ecd867e0ba0.495ee79e-f305-4716-848b-aa2593922768.prompt=Enter the Extension (Eg. txt, xls) \: 697e61e2-8f9e-4b0c-aa50-7ecd867e0ba0.565aa144-95e3-476c-864f-8c4ca86721c8.prompt=Enter the Extension (Eg. txt, xls) \: 697e61e2-8f9e-4b0c-aa50-7ecd867e0ba0.5cba0137-1258-41d2-96da-382fa09b6b83.prompt=Enter the Extension (Eg. txt, xls) \: 697e61e2-8f9e-4b0c-aa50-7ecd867e0ba0.5fad1acf-6ca6-4eb5-aabc-08ab97f47a23.description=
 
To Zip the files in the specified folder corresponding to the given extension in the Local Machine.

Inputs \:
1. directory		- Path of the Folder in which the files to be Zipped.
2. extension		- Type of files to be Zipped.
3. date		- Date up to which the files to Zip.
4. archive Name	- Name of the Zip file to be created.

Responses \:
1. success		- If the files has been Zipped successfully.
2. failure		- If any problems occurred while Zip.

Result\:
It will return the code '1' if the flow succeeds and '0' if it fails.

Note \:
1. If the local or remote machine cannot be connected then in the 
Control Panel  >> Security Center >> Windows Firewall turn off the Firewall in that target machine.

2. If the flow fails due to the non availability of vjslib.dll,vjredist.exe has to 
be installed to continue the action which can be downloaded from the following link.
http\://msdn.microsoft.com/vjsharp/downloads/howtoget/default.aspx
697e61e2-8f9e-4b0c-aa50-7ecd867e0ba0.620b4c7f-33cf-473c-8d18-b6a3b7ec5bb1.prompt=Enter the Directory in which to Zip \: 697e61e2-8f9e-4b0c-aa50-7ecd867e0ba0.6984d512-9307-4daa-8e94-09c1c0869f4b.prompt=Enter the date (mm/dd/yyyy hh\:mm\:ss) \: 697e61e2-8f9e-4b0c-aa50-7ecd867e0ba0.6ddb7f9f-356f-47d8-b5ae-d3b4ea1f899b.prompt=Give a username\: 697e61e2-8f9e-4b0c-aa50-7ecd867e0ba0.72776e4d-31ac-4ee5-b2fa-57f40e81928d.prompt=Select the Operation \: 697e61e2-8f9e-4b0c-aa50-7ecd867e0ba0.7759d152-96cb-4313-94c8-13f5b37dd1da.prompt=Enter the Password \: 697e61e2-8f9e-4b0c-aa50-7ecd867e0ba0.80b37a74-81f6-4ed1-8d6d-08ba8f6d7e13.description=
 To Zip the files in the specified folder corresponding to the given extension in the Remote Machine

Inputs \:
1. host		- Name of the Machine in which the Operation has to be Performed.
2. username		- User Id of that Remote Machine.
3. password		- Password of that User. 
4. directory		- Path of the Folder in which the files to Zip
5. extension		- Type of files to Zip.
6. date		- Date up to which the files to Zip.
7. archiveName	- Name of the Zip file to be created.

Responses \:
1. success		- If the files has been Deleted successfully.
2. failure		- If any problems occurred while deleting.

Result\:
It will return the code '1' if the flow succeeds and '0' if it fails.

Note \:
1. If the local or remote machine cannot be connected then in the 
Control Panel  >> Security Center >> Windows Firewall turn off the Firewall in that target machine.

2. If the flow fails due to the non availability of vjslib.dll,vjredist.exe has to 
be installed to continue the action which can be downloaded from the following link.
http\://msdn.microsoft.com/vjsharp/downloads/howtoget/default.aspx
697e61e2-8f9e-4b0c-aa50-7ecd867e0ba0.940868ee-7aba-4585-b4d5-f8a8bdd1db83.prompt=Enter the Name of the zipped file \: 697e61e2-8f9e-4b0c-aa50-7ecd867e0ba0.a73d0155-75b7-458c-966f-c900b7e68c7c.prompt=Enter the Name of the Zipped file \: 697e61e2-8f9e-4b0c-aa50-7ecd867e0ba0.a7f84f52-783a-4fb3-b0dd-5d83d38615b7.prompt=Enter the Machine Name \: 697e61e2-8f9e-4b0c-aa50-7ecd867e0ba0.b15e472c-5771-43d9-822f-9077972d238c.prompt=Enter the Directory in which to Zip \: 697e61e2-8f9e-4b0c-aa50-7ecd867e0ba0.c24d4ccd-fbb1-4960-adfa-ecef99609a66.description=Allows a user to select whether to delete a file or zip a file in a local machine or in a remote machine. Inputs\: Action - The action to perform. Returns\: the given action. Responses\: LocalDelete - Files of specified extension from the given path will be deleted in the local machine LocalZip - Files of specified extension from the given path will be zipped in to a given archive name in the local machine RemoteDelete - Files of specified extension from the given path will be deleted in the Remote machine RemoteZip - Files of specified extension from the given path will be zipped in to a given archive name in the Remotemachine 697e61e2-8f9e-4b0c-aa50-7ecd867e0ba0.d2c988e0-eb0e-4a9c-97af-fcff0385365c.prompt=Enter the Machine name \: 697e61e2-8f9e-4b0c-aa50-7ecd867e0ba0.description=
A sample flow that demonstrates how to use the Action operation to execute different operations at runtime based on user preference. This flow deletes or zips files with specified extension in remote or local machine with an optional date input.

Inputs \:
Action	- Whether to delete or zip the file, locally or remotely.
host	- Name of the system in which the Operation (Delete or Zip) is going to be performed.
user	- User Credentials of the system in which the operations (Delete or Zip) has to be performed.
password	- Password of the particular user in the system in which the operations (Delete or Zip) has to be performed.
directory	- Path of the Folder in which the Operation (Delete or Zip) has to be performed.
extension	- Extension of the files that has to be Deleted or Zipped.
time	- The Date/Time before which the Files has to be Deleted or Zipped. (In Every flow the Date/Time is an Optional one).
archiveName - The name in which the zip file has to be generated.

Responses \:
success		- if the desired operation (delete or zip) performed successfully.
failure		- any error occurs while executing  the flow.

Note 1\:
This flow will initially prompt for input for the input variable Action. Based on the selection, additional inputs will be required which are described above. 

Note 2\:
This flow requires vjslib.dll to be installed. If unavailable, get the Visual J\# Redistributable Package from the following link-
http\://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/vjsharp/bb188598.aspx
697e61e2-8f9e-4b0c-aa50-7ecd867e0ba0.ed9be3f5-a91d-4394-8994-ea6bb79aa7f9.description=
 To Delete the files in the specified folder corresponding to the given extension in the Remote Machine.

Inputs \:

1. host		- Name of the Machine in which the Operation has to be Performed.
2. username		- User Id of that Remote Machine.
3. password		- Password of that User. 
4. directory		- Path of the Folder in which the files to be Deleted
5. extension		- Type of files to be Deleted.
6. date		- Date up to which the files to Delete.

Responses \:
1. success		- If the files has been Deleted successfully.
2. failure		- If any problems occurred while Deletion.

Result\:
It will return the code '1' if the flow succeeds and '0' if it fails.

Note \:
1. If the local or remote machine cannot be connected then in the 
Control Panel  >> Security Center >> Windows Firewall turn off the Firewall in that target machine.

2. If the flow fails due to the non availability of vjslib.dll,vjredist.exe has to 
be installed to continue the action which can be downloaded from the following link.
http\://msdn.microsoft.com/vjsharp/downloads/howtoget/default.aspx
697e61e2-8f9e-4b0c-aa50-7ecd867e0ba0.f92ce0a7-fdaa-419b-8b9b-3f4ac5cd71a1.description=
 
Deletes the files in the specified folder corresponding to the given extension in the Local Machine

Inputs \:

1. directory		- Path of the Folder in which the files to be Deleted.
2. extension		- Type of files to be Deleted.
3. date		- Date up to which the files to Delete.
									 	
Responses \:
1. success		- If the files has been Deleted successfully.
2. failure		- If any problems occurred while deleting.

Result\:
It will return the code '1' if the flow succeeds and '0' if it fails.

Note \:
1. If the local or remote machine cannot be connected then in the 
Control Panel  >> Security Center >> Windows Firewall turn off the Firewall in that target machine.

2. If the flow fails due to the non availability of vjslib.dll,vjredist.exe has to 
be installed to continue the action which can be downloaded from the following link.
http\://msdn.microsoft.com/vjsharp/downloads/howtoget/default.aspx
flow.name: Windows Delete or Zip
